name: Introduction to Textile Arts
description: This course provides an overview of basic textile techniques and materials, as well as the principles of design for creating textile art.

name: Textile Arts History
description: This course covers the history of textile arts from pre-industrial times to the present.

name: Textile Dyeing and Printing
description: This course covers the techniques of dyeing and printing with natural and synthetic dyes, and the principles of color theory.

name: Weaving and Fabric Construction
description: This course covers the principles and techniques of weaving and fabric construction, including hand-weaving, machine-weaving, and non-woven techniques.

name: Textile Arts Techniques
description: This course covers various techniques of textile art-making, including needlework, crochet, knitting, quilting, and embroidery.

name: Textile Arts Design
description: This course covers the principles of design and composition for creating textile art, including the use of texture, color, and pattern.
